title: Mayor Bowser Wants 70% Of D.C. Adults Partially Vaccinated By July 4
description: Bowser signed onto a challenge with 53 other mayors to see who can get their cities to the 70% of adults vaccinated goal by July 4.
cleaned_text: This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible.
